overview_summary: Only one of the four neighboring landowners has voiced a stance on local development, expressing opposition to industrial impacts, while the others have no recorded positions. All appear to wield limited direct influence in the community, with no high-profile local officials among them.

neighbors.name: Lloyd S. Fultz Jr. & Dawn E. Fultz
neighbors.claims: Lloyd S. Fultz Jr. is a resident of Old Fields in Hardy County [Moorefield Examiner](https://hardylive.com/2024/12/04/letter-to-the-editor-6/). He wrote a letter to the editor arguing that poultry giant Pilgrim’s Pride is a major local polluter causing health problems and should be assessed fees per chicken processed to fund emergency services [Moorefield Examiner](https://hardylive.com/2024/12/04/letter-to-the-editor-6/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage him through a community or environmental liaison, emphasizing the project’s strict environmental safeguards and health benefits to address his pollution concerns.

neighbors.name: George Robert Shockey, Maude E. Shockey & Robert Shockey
neighbors.claims: George R. Shockey was born in Old Fields, WV in 1946 and lived there his entire life, passing away in November 2024 at age 78 [Fraley Funeral Home](https://www.fraleyfuneralhome.com/obituaries/george-shockey). He is survived by his wife, Maude “Sis” Shockey, and their son, Robert Shockey, who resides in Pennsylvania [Moorefield Examiner](https://hardylive.com/2024/11/26/george-shockey/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a respected community member reach out with respect for the Shockey family’s long local legacy and assurances that the project will not disrupt their land or lifestyle.

neighbors.name: Cary Joe Turner & Jennifer Turner
neighbors.claims: No evidence of Cary or Jennifer Turner holding any public office or participating in local civic matters could be found in Hardy County records [Hardy County Clerk Online Records](https://hardycounty.com/public-meetings). They maintain a low profile in the community, with no references in local news or meetings as of late 2025 [Hardy County Clerk Online Records](https://hardycounty.com/public-meetings).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach privately and neighbor-to-neighbor, focusing on listening to any concerns since they have not voiced opinions publicly.

neighbors.name: David Stephens & Shari Stephens
neighbors.claims: David and Shari Stephens have no notable public profile in Hardy County; no records or local news mention them taking part in development discussions [Hardy County Clerk Online Records](https://hardycounty.com/public-meetings). They are simply known as property owners, without any public-facing roles or statements on community issues [Hardy County Clerk Online Records](https://hardycounty.com/public-meetings).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage through informal, personal outreach via a mutual acquaintance or neighbor, focusing on building trust since they have not been publicly involved in local issues.
